title: The Magic Box [1951 - UK] biographical drama
description:
The Magic Box (1951 - UK)

Biography / Drama

with a cast of . . . . over sixty British stars!
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0043769/


BAFTA Awards - Nominated - Best British Film

The true story of William Friese-Green, a young British photographer who dreams of making the projection of moving images into a reality. Through various experiments, luck and sheer perseverance, he succeeds in creating a working motion picture camera. However, his achievement fails to capture public attention. In an AFI poll actor Jack Lemmon named The Magic Box as his favorite film.


Video: XviD, 640x480, 25.000 fps, 727 Kbps, 01h43m16s
Audio: MP3, 44100 Hz, joint stereo, 112 kbps

SATRip, English audio, optional subtitles English and Spanish
